channel.title: Noble missing feedback
channel.description:
#### What happened? I was noble, had gossips on a sheriff and (later) a prince. The feedback only listed the alchemist that healed them, it did not include the chronomancer who insisted that they were also on the same targets. They were legit chrono, when court later upped and exe'd them after they falsely exe'd me.
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen? I was supposed to receive feedback of all abilities used. I mean, if Noble doesnt receive all feedback, what good are they?
#### Steps to reproduce: Be a noble. Gossip someone healed by and alchemist and timewarped by a chronomancer. Receive less feedback than expected. Profit. Oh wait, get exe'd for 'false logs'.
#### Comments: Annoying bug to be honest, it could've easily have cost the game.

item.title: Noble missing feedback
item.dc:creator: hesse
item.description:
None of us were converted.

Read full topic

item.title: Noble missing feedback
item.dc:creator: katze
item.description:
Were you converted the night you missed feedback? Or were you and the Chrono both unconverted? This sounds like a new bug to me.

Read full topic

item.title: Noble missing feedback
item.dc:creator: hesse
item.description:
What happened?

I was noble, had gossips on a sheriff and (later) a prince. The feedback only listed the alchemist that healed them, it did not include the chronomancer who insisted that they were also on the same targets. They were legit chrono, when court later upped and exe’d them after they falsely exe’d me.

What was SUPPOSED to happen?

I was supposed to receive feedback of all abilities used. I mean, if Noble doesnt receive all feedback, what good are they?

Steps to reproduce:

Be a noble. Gossip someone healed by and alchemist and timewarped by a chronomancer. Receive less feedback than expected. Profit. Oh wait, get exe’d for ‘false logs’.

Comments:

Annoying bug to be honest, it could’ve easily have cost the game.
